title: Tidings of Erebor (2U13)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Regroup: Spot a Dwarf to draw 3 cards. Any Shadow player may remove (3) to prevent this.
Lore:	”'…we have so far been fortunate, though we do not escape the shadow of these times.'”
Rarity:	U
